rationale: Describes historical findings ('highest-risk situation', 'very few cases') related to scientific understanding/capability without explicit calming keywords.
statement_text: If you look at the cases that have occurred since 1997, when it [H5N1] first emerged in human cases in Hong Kong, through to mid-2015 to 2016, those years were by far the highest-risk situation. Weâ€™ve seen very few cases in humans since then [mid-2015/2016].
